00064  //
00065  // class val
00066  //
00067  // val is a subclass of Value, which supports standard math operations and provides convenience
00068  // functions.  It can be thought of as an "any type" or "variant" that can store any type.
00069  //
00070 
00071     class val : public Value {
00072     
00073      public:
00074
